org.concordion.internal.cache

Enum RunResultsCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<RunResultsCache>
      • org.concordion.internal.cache.RunResultsCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<RunResultsCache>

    public enum RunResultsCache
extends java.lang.Enum<RunResultsCache>
    A thread-safe class to provide caching of run results.

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Clears the cache. Should only really be used by tests.

      • getFromCache

        public ConcordionRunOutput getFromCache(Fixture fixture,
                               java.lang.String example)
        Provides a direct method to access the cache
        Parameters:
        fixture - fixture containing class to retrieve from the cache
        example - the example to get from the cache
        Returns:
        can return null if not in the cache

      • getFromCache

        public ConcordionRunOutput getFromCache(java.lang.Class<?> fixtureClass,
                               java.lang.String example)
        Provides a direct method to access the cache
        Parameters:
        fixtureClass - class to retrieve from the cache
        example - the example to get from the cache
        Returns:
        can return null if not in the cache

      • startRun

        public ConcordionRunOutput startRun(Fixture fixture,
                           java.lang.String example)
        Searches for a match in the cache. If there is no match, it marks the test as "in progress". This is done in one method to avoid thread synchronization issues.
        Parameters:
        fixture - the fixture to retrieve
        example - the name of the example that is being started (null OK)
        Returns:
        the result summary from the cache

      • finishRun

        public void finishRun(Fixture fixture,
             java.lang.String example,
             ResultSummary actualResultSummary,
             ResultSummary modifiedResultSummary)
        Updates the cache with the results of a run.
        Parameters:
        fixture - the fixture to update
        example - the name of the example that is being finished (null ok)
        actualResultSummary - the results as reported from the spec
        modifiedResultSummary - the results as post processed by any fixture annotations

        public ConcordionRunOutput createTotalResultSummary(ResultSummary actualResultSummary)

        public void failRun(Fixture fixture,
           java.lang.String example)
